events.message: I received my order yesterday, but the item is not what I expected and I would like to request a refund as soon as possible.
The issue has been identified as a refund request based on customer's message about wanting money back for their order.
The case has been assigned to agent Maria for handling the refund process of the customer's order.
Hello, thank you for reaching out. I understand you want to request a refund, and I'm here to help you with that.
Could you please provide the order number and let us know if the item is still in its original packaging?
My order number is 43782910, and the item is unopened and still sealed in its original packaging.
Thank you for the details. We can process your refund once we receive the returned item. I will send you a prepaid return label shortly.
Thanks for the quick response and for providing the return label. I will send the item back right away.
We have received the returned product and processed your refund. The amount should appear on your original payment method within 3-5 business days.
Just following up to ensure the refund has been received and if there is anything else I can assist you with.
Since your refund has been completed and there are no further questions, I am closing this case now. Have a great day!
We would appreciate if you could take a moment to fill out our satisfaction survey regarding your refund experience.
